full_summary:
Title: [Employment Opportunity] Pension Actuary

Pubication Date: January 3, 2024 

Closes: January 31, 2024, 3:00 PM CST 

**Notice:**

Farm Credit Canada (FCC) is seeking a qualified Pension Actuary to provide actuarial and consulting services for its pension and post-employment benefit plans.

The successful applicant will be responsible for providing all necessary actuarial services, customary and required to support the Defined Benefit Pension Plan. In addition, the selected provider will provide reporting and services required by the Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions (OSFI) for both the defined benefit and defined contribution portions of the plan.

The scope of the project involves providing:

* Actuarial valuation services for the pension and post-employment benefit plans
* Annual accounting disclosures pursuant to International Financial Reporting Standards (IFRS)
* Reporting services, as required by OSFI and the Corporation

**Notice Requirements and Guidelines:**

To ensure a fair competition process, the following requirements and guidelines apply:

*  All bidders must register on Merx, the Canadian Public Tenders electronic bidding system 
* Proposals must be submitted electronically through Merx by January 31, 2024, 3:00 PM CST
* Bidders may submit their questions regarding the Request for Proposal (RFP) by January 12, 2024, 2:00 PM CST
* Answers to all questions will be provided on January 22, 2024

**Additional Information**

* This RFP is covered by the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and Chapter 19 of the Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* The Official Languages Act of Canada applies to this RFP
*  FCC reserves the right to cancel the RFP at any time
*  The RFP may involve consecutive or simultaneous negotiations between the Corporation and the successful bidder

**Contact Information:**

 For any questions regarding this RFP, kindly contact:

Adam Gottselig
Procurement Manager
Farm Credit Canada
adam.gottselig@fcc.ca

FCC is committed to ensuring that the selection process is fair, open, and transparent. We look forward to receiving your proposal!
